name: Typo Delivery Service
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 100

- Theme: Overload

- Limitation: Chaos is everything

Move with the left and right arrow keys to collect the boxes. Once you have collected 7 boxes, the tower they form will start to shake. Press the letter on the shirt of the carrier when an exclamation mark appears to make it stop or you will lose 2 lives!

If you make a tower stop shaking you will gain some points. It will also happen if you keep a tower up for 10 seconds without making it fall.

3D models for the road and buildings from https://kenney.nl/assets <3
